QuestData.Title: A Gift For Sho
QuestData.Description: Sho - that girl who lives up in the mountains - is in town today. I saw her walking toward the Halfhill Market.$b$bSuch a long walk... she must be hungry! And I think I know just the thing that she'll like.$b$bThe hozen up on the Skyrange cook a soup out of fish and apples. It sounds gross, I know... but it's awesome. You'll find it near their big, scary totem.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I wouldn't want to live up in the mountains like her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a bowl of Yu-Ping Soup.
